isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - GENERAL INFORMATION - 1991

svcproc.title: INTRODUCTION
svcproc.para: This service manual section contains information about the electronic engine control systems for the 9300 / 9400 Series. This section is designed to complement the service and troubleshooting manuals released by the engine manufacturers. Literature available from the engine manufacturers is listed in each chapter, including the address needed to obtain the manuals. The engine manufacturers manuals include step-by-step instructions for diagnosis and repair.
This section shows how the engine control circuit diagrams are arranged, explains symbols used in the diagrams, and describes how to locate components and connections.
